divs: Sighting Detailsit was daytime i heard a loud hissing sound, my friends we looked up at the same time and saw this object covered in fog, with bright blue and green flouescent lights inside, and a tail of flame fly really low across the sky.
Summary: covered in fog, flurescent lights inside the fogg ,and loud hissing sound as object flew over
